Summary: Two bright lights southwest from Exton, PA. Smaller light above, larger light below to right. smaller light blink above small light to right. 45 min. view, only light in sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed two very bright lights, really the only lights I saw in the sky. as I left work at approx 5:30 p.m. in Frazer, PA. One light was at say 12 o'clock to my left South West ( looking at Digital Compass in car ) & a larger light & brighter then the top light. Larger by about 20% & also in brightness.The larger light was around 4 o'clock compared to the top smaller light. I saw a few planes go by but they were much dimmer & smaller, also in seconds I could see the planes move in the sky, but the two light stayed stationary all the time I was viewing them & the brightness satayed the same. In the first 10 min. I noticed above the top light to it's right was a much smaller light maybe only 10% the size of the 1st small light. This light blinked on & off around 3 or 4 times, then vanished. I kept my eyes on the light best I could ( kicking myself for not having my camera " Always Have Your Camera With You " ) Around 6 p.m. I cam to a red light & could keep the lights in sight between a telephone poll & a wire that ran on a angle from the right poll out away to the ground. I saw a plane again lower in the sky, dimmer & smaller, fly from left to right. In the 3 to 5 min. I was at the red light the plane moved from the left between the distance between the polls & out to the right of the poles. The brighter lights Never Moved. I felt the lights ( UFO ) was maybe out around the Chadds Ford, Kennetsquare area. I turned off of Rt. 113 on to Rt. 30 heading west to Coatesville. The two lights in about 1 min. became very dim & smaller, with in 3 min. they were gone. As I got to the Braindywine Hospital, I noticed a lot of cloud cover in the area. I stopped at my fathers & looked up in to the sky I then could see some stars much dimmer then the lights I saw. I thought I couldn't see the bright lights becouse of the clouds but I could see much dimmer & mean Much dimmer stars & all the time I was observing the two bright lights & planes & Never Saw Any Stars. I wonder what they were & if anyone else saw them, they were the only thing in the sky for a good 45 min.
